featured.text: People from both groups were placed inside the MRI scanner.
In the study, the subjects were placed inside the MRI scanner to (A) observe the activities of the brains when they used languages.

definition.zh_def: 掃描器，一種用於將實體文件或圖像轉換為數字格式的設備。
definition.en_def: A device used to convert physical documents or images into digital format.
definition.example: I used a scanner to digitize my old photographs.
